Acceleor Job Search Extension:
Tool to improve productivity of agents by helping them getting profils informations from job searches.
The tool is using the current url of the user to extract the query and collect the link of the job and the company in a table. This table can be exported to a CSV.
This tool was created as a collaboration between ACCELEOR and PRF Development.
